info.title: MetahOS API
info.description:
# Overview
MetahOS API lets you interact with the MetahOS platform. In the following APIs the BaseUrl refers to the Platform-Url

For Example: demo.metahos.com/api/external/webhook

Here "demo" will be replaced by your platform subdomain
# Authentication
MetahOS API expects an username, and password. All MetahOS API calls are executed in an account's context.

example.error: Camp with camp name 'Health Camp' already exists.

200.description: Returns list of screenings with pagination.
Returns list of leads with pagination.

get.description: Get a list of details of all doctors. Optional filters like name, department, pageNo, limit can be applied.

requestBody.description: Name and mobile number should be unique

200.description: Returns success true if success and if a doctor exists with same name or phone number returns false
Returns success true if success and if a doctor exists with same name or phone number returns false
Returns success as boolean along with complete record object

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Text search on patient name, UHID, or mobile

200.description: List of patients with pagination metadata

get.summary: List journey entries for a patient

200.description: List of journey records for the patient

post.summary: Fetch available time slots of an entity (doctor, room, etc).

200.description: successfully fetched slots and returns list of slots

get.summary: Get the details of a patient
get.description: Get the details of patient matching the uhid provided.

200.description: Returns patient list and count if success

post.description: Upload ECG report for a patient using UHID.

uhid.description: Unique Health Identifier (UHID) of the patient.

prescriptionData.diagnosis: Please see Dr. Arnav in Oncology

200.description: Consultation created successfully or validation failure

400.description: Client error - patient or doctor not found, or duplicate consultation

consultationId.description: ID of the consultation to update

get.summary: List consultations with filters, pagination, and export support

parameters.name: whichdate
parameters.description: Specifies which date field to filter on (fromDate/toDate/bothDate)

parameters.name: option
parameters.description: Date field to apply filter (e.g., scheduledAt, createdAt)

parameters.name: scheduledBy
parameters.description: User ID who scheduled the consultation

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for doctor, patient, or billNumber

parameters.name: todayOnly
parameters.description: Date field to use when filtering only today's consultations

parameters.name: currentStatusValue
parameters.description: Current status of consultation from queue.label

parameters.name: ipd
parameters.description: If true, fetch IPD consultations only

parameters.name: handleCorporate
parameters.description: Filter based on corporate or cash consultation

post.summary: Upload files to a Consultation or Appointment
Add external identifiers to a consultation

externalVisitId.description: External visit ID (e.g., HIS visit reference)

externalValidityString.description: Validity string or expiration info from external system

200.description: Successfully updated consultation with external IDs

400.description: Missing required data or invalid consultation ID

id.description: Consultation ID to clear or unschedule

scheduledAt.description: Datetime of the originally scheduled consultation

roomEvent.description: Room event ID to be removed

billId.description: Bill ID associated with the consultation

amount.description: Amount to deduct if clearing the consultation

forRefund.description: Flag to initiate refund queue process

invokeQueueStatusWebhook.description: Invoke queue status webhook after status change

500.description: Internal server error during consultation update

post.summary: Change queue status for a consultation or appointment

appointmentId.description: ID of the appointment or consultation

500.description: Internal server error during status update

schema.description: List of queue status breakdowns per doctor

unpaid.description: Number of unpaid consultations or appointments

booked.description: Number of booked but not yet checked-in/completed

checkedIn.description: Number of patients currently checked in

get.summary: Get consultations with pending integration status
get.description: Returns a list of consultations that have `integrationStatus` set to 'PENDING'. You can optionally filter by `fromDate` and `toDate` on the scheduledAt field.

200.description: List of pending consultations retrieved successfully

totalCount.description: Total number of consultations fetched (before filtering by status)

externalUhid.description: Identifies a patient from other platform
Identifies a patient from other platform

doctors.description: array containin objects of type doctor.

patients.description: array containin objects of type patient.

items.description: Can be any ObjectShould be Stringified JSON

status.description: Status of the consultation (e.g., scheduled, completed, clear, unscheduled)

completedAt.description: Datetime when consultation was marked completed

externalConsultationId.description: External system's ID for the consultation

label.description: Current queue status (e.g., Checked In, Completed)
